ygData.subject: RE: General grousing
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyone that can buff you is good - even an enchanter in a pinch - just make a two man/woman/thing team and have at it - Rathe is good, and South Ro is great -
ygData.messageBody:
Anyone that can buff you is good - even an enchanter in a pinch - just make
a two man/woman/thing team and have at it - Rathe is good, and South Ro is
great - not crowded, many camps, etc. etc.

-----Original Message-----
From: John Carney [mailto:jcarney@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 5:32 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] General grousing


From: "John Carney" <jcarney@...>

>My advice, make nicey-nice with a Shaman of near your level and sew
yourself to his/her side.

I made friends with anyone I could, heh. Actually, a cleric is awesome, too,
at that point because they're still viable meelee types at that point, and
the healing just can't be beat.

Of course, finding a free cleric or shaman is another matter all together.
My advice would be to find a cleric and start killing aviaks in Lake Rathe
(one of the more interesting zones in the game).

Stonedorn Windrunner
Cunnan's Brewing Company
Xegony
